attributes.action: stop the current wave of deportation of D. R. Congolese nationals whose asylum application has failed.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The mass removal of Congolese asylum seekers on a specially chartered XL flight or any other means should not be allowed to proceed as imprisonment; torture and mistreatment are all that await them.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "stop the current wave of deportation of D. R. Congolese nationals whose asylum application has failed."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12237.asp
